title: North American sports market size 2009 to 2023
yAxis: Sports market revenue in billion U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Sports market revenue in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Sports market revenue in billion U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2010 to 2012, and lastly slightly increasing from 2012 to 2015.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Sports market revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 63.56 was reached at Year 2015
Minimum Sports market revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 49.99 was reached at Year 2010
